title: Hungry Games!
description: To use any of these commands you must have the "{hgRole}" role. Use https://www.spikeybot.com/hg/ if commands are too hard.

rows.description: This will create a game with default settings if it doesn't exist already.
List options if no name, or change the option if you give a name.
Delete data about the Games. Don't choose an option for more info.
This will list all players I currently care about.
Prevent someone from being added to the next game.
Add a person back into the next game.
This will swap two players to the other team.
This will move the first player, to another team. (Ignores teamSize option)
Rename a team. Specify its id, or mention someone on a team.
Randomize who is on what team.
Delete all teams and start over.
This will list all custom events that could happen in the game.
This will let you download all of the events and their data.
Begins process of adding a custom event.
Remove a custom event. The number is the number shown in the list of events.
This will start a game with your settings.
This will end a game early.
Automatically continue to the next day after a day is over.
Stop autoplay at the end of the day.
Simulate the next day of the Games!
